content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 1, Xerez 1.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 1, Xerez 1.
Attempt missed. Mario Bermejo (Xerez) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Pablo Redondo following a set piece situation.

Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Héctor Font.
Attempt saved. Emilio Sánchez (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Jordi Matamala.
Substitution, Recreativo. Dani replaces Asen.
Goal!  Recreativo 1, Xerez 1. Miguel Ángel Cordero (Xerez) header from very close range to the bottom left corner following a fast break.
